title: Honda Motorcycle launches new bike CB300R at Rs 2.77 lakh
description: The new CB300R is powered by a 286cc 4-valve liquid cooled single cylinder engine. It comes equipped with an assist and slipper clutch, which provides an assist function for clutch operations requiring less load compared to a regular clutch mechanism.
